*HAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHA-*
HA!

But in all seriousness the most likely scenario for the 2014 elections is that republicans will pick up between four to six seats and *MIGHT* gain control of the senate by *ONE* seat.

As for the 2016 it's being called "the death of the republican party" by political forecasters due that democrats will start off with 250 electoral votes out of the 270 needed to win.

Oh never mind then.  I didn't know you lived in New Zealand.

If you're wondering why I assumed you lived in the USA was because the right wing has been talking shit the last couple of years about how they're supposedly going to take control of all levels of government, impeach Obama and exterminate the left wing.  Considering how much there's been talk about how supposedly Obama is going to be removed from office, we've never actually had a president removed from office is why it's so hilarious, lately it was a honest mistake.
